title: Puthiya Ulagai Lyrics Yennamo Yedho Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Puthiya Ulagai
Singer: Vaikom Vijayalakshmi
Music: D Imman
Lyrics : Karky
Movie: Yennamo Yedho

Puthiya Ulagai Puthiya Ulagai
thaedi pogiren, ennai vidu.
Vizhiyin thuliyil ninaivai karaithu
odi pogiren ennai vidu.

Pirivil thodangi pooththadhai
pirivil mudindhu pogiren.
meenum naan meela pogiren
dhooramaai vazhapogiren.

Puthiya Ulagai Puthiya Ulagai
thaedi pogiren, ennai vidu.
Vizhiyin thuliyil ninaivai karaithu
odi pogiren ennai vidu.

Maaril keerinai,
ranangalai varangalakinaai.
thozhil yerinaai,
ennai innum uyaramaakkinaai.
Un vizhipola mannil engum
azhagu illai endren.
Un vizhi ingu kanneer sindha
vilagi engae sendren.
Un meley nindru unnai naalum
kaanum aasaiyil...

Puthiya Ulagai Puthiya Ulagai
thaedi pogiren, ennai vidu.

Yaarum theendidaa idangalil
manadhai theendinaai.
yaarum paarthidaa sirippinil
en idhazhai theettinaai.

Unmanam pola vinnil engum
amaidhi illai endren.
unmanam indru vendaam endre
parandhu engae sendren.
veror vaanam veror vazhakai
ennai yerkkumaa.

Puthiya Ulagai Puthiya Ulagai
thaedi pogiren, ennai vidu.

Pirivil thodangi pooththadhai
pirivil mudindhu pogiren.
meenum naan meela pogiren
dhooramaai vazhapogiren.

Puthiya Ulagai Puthiya Ulagai
thaedi pogiren, ennai vidu.
